thread.title: Value Should Do Better. But When Is Anybody’s Guess

author: Jason Zweig
title: Value Should Do Better. But When Is Anybody’s Guess
text:
Value investors haven’t been wandering in the wilderness for 40 years, but it’s starting to feel that way. Over the past 10 years, the S&P 500 Value Index of companies selling at low prices relative to their earnings, revenues and net worth has returned an average of 7.1% annually. The S&P 500 Growth Index — […]
